context.name: Yukon Ranger Pro 5x42 Night Vision Binoculars
context.excerpt: The Ranger Pro 5×42 digital night vision binoculars feature a more sensitive CCD coupled with advanced SumLight technology that gives an increased viewing range of up to 500m and a sharper image.
context.content:
The Yukon Ranger Pro 5x42 Night Vision Binoculars feature a more sensitive CCD coupled with advanced SumLight technology that gives an increased viewing range of up to 500m and a sharper image.

The Yukon Ranger series pioneered digital night vision and its renowned performance and reliability have made them bestsellers. The combination of digital technology and high magnification provides flexibility and extended viewing ranges.

Maximum viewing range: 500m
Digital night vision
Comes with case & neck Strap
In-built tripod mount
Gen: Digital (high sensitivity CCD sensor array)
Sum Light software technology
Black rubberised bodyshell
Video out socket
Variable brightness/contrast control
LED "on" & "low battery" indicators
Built-in low output & high output IR illuminators
